description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Update Stack elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38163), it is crucial to apply the provided security updates for affected Windows versions:

1. For Windows 11 Version 21H2, download and apply KB5042321 from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. For Windows 10 Versions 22H2 and 21H2, download and apply KB5042320 from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates resolve the improper access control issue that could allow local attackers to elevate privileges.
- Ensure your system is running the applicable version of Windows before applying the updates.
- Backup critical data prior to installation.

**Update Package Links**:
- Windows 11 KB5042321: [Download KB5042321](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5042321)
- Windows 10 KB5042320: [Download KB5042320](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5042320)
